alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Sanpete Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Millard and Juab Counties; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 6:16PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHERN SANPETE...NORTHEASTERN JUAB...CENTRAL WASATCH...SOUTHWESTERN SALT LAKE...UTAH AND SOUTHEASTERN TOOELE COUNTIES... At 615 PM MST...an area of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Bingham Canyon Mine to 11 miles southeast of Woodland Hills... and moving northeast at 35 mph. Locations impacted include... Provo, Payson, Orem, Lehi, Draper, Spanish Fork, Pleasant Grove, Springville, American Fork, Herriman, Eagle Mountain, Lindon, Alpine, Santaquin, Mapleton, Bluffdale, Salem, Elk Ridge, Woodland Hills and Daniel. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 229 and 288. US Route 6 between mile markers 121 and 205. US Route 40 between mile markers 21 and 35. US Route 89 between mile markers 296 and 312. * winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
